articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Covid: US to lift travel ban for fully jabbed on 8 November
articles.description: Fully vaccinated travellers will be allowed to enter the US for the first time since March 2020.
articles.content: The current rules bar entry to most non-US citizens who have been in the UK and a number of other European countries, China, India, South Africa, Iran and Brazil within the last 14 days.
